domosaics.ui.io.menureader
Class DefaultMenuActionManager

java.lang.Object
  domosaics.ui.io.menureader.DefaultMenuActionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuActionManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
ViewActionManager
public class DefaultMenuActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuActionManager

Class DefaultMenuActionManager implements MenuActionManager and defines all needed methods to add and retrieve loaded actions.
Actions are defined in a formatted menu file and parsed into AbstractMenuActions, which are after creation automatically stored in the action manager.
To get access to this actions the getMethod can be used, for instance as followed:
if (manager.getAction(ShowEdgeLabelsAction.class) != null)
// do something

Author:
Andreas Held
